ai.summary: Camborne FP 76 is a very short, easy hike in the United Kingdom, covering about 0.1 km on a maintained footpath. It's suitable for beginners, families, or a quick nature break.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained footpath. Likely urban or parkland setting with a smooth surface and minimal gradients.
ai.safety_notes: General hiking safety: stay on the official path, be aware of pedestrians and traffic if the route passes near roads, check weather conditions, wear sturdy footwear, bring water, and supervise children. Even on a short 0.1 km outing, remain aware of your surroundings and any local advisories or closures.
recommended_gear: Map or mobile phone with the route
